name: Flying car driving flight sim
description:
Flying car driving flight sim:
Good game for driving ,shooting and flying car as airplane.you can shoot and destroy the others car and complete the multiple level.you can really enjoy this game.
As you drive the car the in the streets, or high flying of airplane in the sky, did you ever think about the Flying Car.
Take the driver seat of special featured car, drift the car, and do amazing stunts in the city, and in the steers of city, then activate the flying mode and change your car into high flying unique car. You will enjoy like a airplane flight.
Fly through and amazingly detailed city environment, dodge and weave between skyscrapers.
Perfect the flying car and become the world's best pilot
Go to extreme speeds with super charged nitro boosts
Flying Car Simulator 3D is made for all of you flight and driving simulation game fans, with all the best parts in one game.
FEATURES:
-Put your driving and flight controls to the test
-Incredible HD Graphics
-Real life sports car modified for flight capability
-Detailed and immersive city world environment
-Fun, realistic driving controls
-Dynamic camera angles
-Intuitive airplane flight physics
-Free to play and easy to use
